headline: Citizens Launches New Suite of Mastercard Credit Cards Designed to Meet the Evolving Needs of Every Customer
summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I., June 12, 2025--As part of its commitment to empowering customers at every stage of their financial journey, Citizens has launched a new suite of Mastercard credit cards designed to address the distinct financial needs and preferences of today’s consumers. Built on years of customers' insights and feedback, the new credit cards offer tailored features that range from establishing credit to maximizing rewards and lifestyle benefits.
